page.title: 08A TEACHER'S DAY.
page.content: SHE STARTS WORK AT 8.30. SHE LEAVES AT 4.30. ON A{SUNDAY}SHE GOES TO CHURCH, GOES OUT TO VISIT HER FAMILY, OR STAYS AT HOME.SHE TEACHES{30 CHILDREN}IN HER CLASS. SHE LIKES TEACHING CHILDREN BECAUSE SHE THINKS IT IS INTERESTING. IN HER SPARE TIME SHE LIKES READING AND GARDENING BUT SHE DOES NOT GET VERY MUCH SPARE TIME. SHE GETS UP AT 7.00 IN THE MORNING. SHE HAS TAUGHT IN 7 DIFFERENT SCHOOLS. HER OWN CHILDREN ARE ALL GROWN UP. SHE GOES TO BED AT 11.00 PM OR LATER. WHEN SHE GETS HOME SHE STARTS TO GET THE TEA OR TAKES HER DOGS OUT FOR A WALK. WHEN SHE HAS HAD HER TEA SHE MARKS SOME SCHOOL BOOKS AND WATCHES T.V OR SOMETIMES SHE GOES TO A MEETING. SHE SOMETIMES READS THE LESSON AT{HEMPSTEAD CHURCH.}SHE SUPERVISES SOME SWIMMING AT{GRESHAM'S {POOL.}HER DAUGHTER IS ALSO A TEACHER.
